import requests
import json
import pandas as pd
from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
from pyspark.sql.functions import hash, col,crc32

launches_url = "https://api.spacexdata.com/v4/launches"
headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json"}

response = requests.get(launches_url)
launches_data = response.json()

import requests, json
from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
from pyspark.sql.functions import hash, col, crc32, explode, explode_outer

spark = SparkSession.builder.appName("launches_data").getOrCreate()

launches_url = "https://api.spacexdata.com/v4/launches"

headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json"}

response = requests.get(launches_url).json()

json_rdd = sc.parallelize([json.dumps(record) for record in launches_data])

df_raw = spark.read.json(json_rdd)

df_fail = df_raw.withColumn(
    "failure_reason",  col("failures").getItem(0).reason
).withColumn(
    "failure_time",    col("failures").getItem(0).time
).withColumn(
    "failure_altitude",col("failures").getItem(0).altitude
)
df1 = df_fail.withColumn("core", explode("cores"))
df2 = df1.withColumn("payload_id", explode("payloads"))
df_spark_launches = df2.select(
    "id",
    "flight_number",
    "name",
    "date_utc",
    "rocket",
    "success",
    "details",
    "launchpad",
    col("fairings.reused").alias("fairings_reused"),
    col("fairings.recovered").alias("fairings_recovered"),
    col("fairings.ships").alias("fairings_ships"),
    "payload_id",
    col("core.core").alias("core_id"),
    col("core.flight").alias("core_flight"),
    col("core.gridfins").alias("core_gridfins"),
    col("core.legs").alias("core_legs"),
    col("core.reused").alias("core_reused"),
    col("core.landing_attempt").alias("core_landing_attempt"),
    col("core.landing_success").alias("core_landing_success"),
    col("core.landing_type").alias("core_landing_type"),
    col("core.landpad").alias("core_landpad"),
    "failure_reason",
    "failure_time",
    "failure_altitude"
)

for c in df_spark_launches.columns:
    new_c = c.replace(".", "_").replace(" ", "_").replace("-", "_")
    df_spark_launches = df_spark_launches.withColumnRenamed(c, new_c)

df_fact_launches = pd.json_normalize(
    launches_data,
    record_path=['cores'], 
    meta=[
        'id',
        'flight_number',
        'name',
        'date_utc',
        'rocket',
        'success',
        'details',
        'launchpad',
        ['fairings', 'reused'],
        ['fairings', 'recovered'],
        ['fairings', 'ships'],
        'payloads'  
    ],
    sep='_',
    errors='ignore'
)

df_fact_launches = df_fact_launches.explode('payloads').reset_index(drop=True)

df_fact_launches.rename(columns={'payloads': 'payload_id'}, inplace=True)

df_fact_launches['failure_reason'] = df_fact_launches['id'].map(
    lambda x: next((launch.get('failures')[0]['reason']
                    for launch in launches_data
                    if launch['id'] == x and launch.get('failures')), None)
)

df_fact_launches['failure_altitude'] = df_fact_launches['id'].map(
    lambda x: next((launch.get('failures')[0]['altitude']
                    for launch in launches_data
                    if launch['id'] == x and launch.get('failures')), None)
)

df_fact_launches['failure_time'] = df_fact_launches['id'].map(
    lambda x: next((launch.get('failures')[0]['time']
                    for launch in launches_data
                    if launch['id'] == x and launch.get('failures')), None)
)

df_fact_launches = df_fact_launches.loc[:, ~df_fact_launches.columns.str.startswith('links')]
df_fact_launches.columns = df_fact_launches.columns.str.replace(r'\W+', '_', regex=True)

spark_fact_launches = spark_fact_launches.withColumns(
    {
        'core_id': crc32('core_id'), 
        'launch_id': crc32('launch_id'), 
        'core_landpad_id': crc32('core_landpad'), 
        'rocket_id': crc32('rocket_id'), 
        'launchpad_id': crc32('launchpad_id'), 
        'payload_id': crc32('payload_id'),
        'fairing_ships_id': crc32('fairings_ships')
    }
)
display(spark_fact_launches)

df_dim_cores = pd.json_normalize(cores_data)
df_dim_cores.drop('launches', axis=1, inplace=True)
df_dim_cores.rename(columns={'id': 'core_id', 'status': 'core_status', 'serial': 'core_serial', 'block': 'core_block'}, inplace=True)
df_dim_cores

spark_dim_cores = spark.createDataFrame(df_dim_cores)
spark_dim_cores = spark_dim_cores.withColumn('core_id', crc32('core_id'))
display(spark_dim_cores)

df_payloads = pd.json_normalize(
    payload_data,
    meta=[
        'id',
        'name',
        'type',
        'reused',
        ['dragon', 'capsule'],
        ['dragon', 'mass_returned_kg'],
        ['dragon', 'flight_time_sec'],
        ['dragon', 'water_landing'],
        ['dragon', 'land_landing'],
        'mass_kg',
        'orbit',
        'reference_system',
        'regtime',
        'longitude',
        'semi_major_axis_km',
        'eccentricity',
        'periapsis_km',
        'apoapsis_km',
        'inclination_deg',
        'period_min',
        'lifespan_years',
        'epoch',
        'mean_motion',
        'raan',
        'arg_of_pericenter',
        'mean_anomaly',
        'id'
    ],
    sep='_',
    errors='ignore'
)

df_dim_payloads = df_payloads.explode('customers').reset_index(drop=True).explode('manufacturers').reset_index(drop=True).explode('nationalities').reset_index(drop=True).explode('norad_ids').reset_index(drop=True)
